comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Sir Arthur Percy Sherwood, born 1854 in Ottawa, Chief Commissioner of the Dominion Police (www.sambiasebooks.ca/fire-on-the-hill/characters/historic...) He is mentionned in connection with the destruction of the Canadian parliament buildings in The Washington herald., February 05, 1916, Image 1, col. 1 (at that time he was colonel).

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Sir Arthur thanks you, and we thank you.  Will update.
